articles.title: Camping
articles.contents:
Attendees seeking for the full experience will join us to camp in the garden.
We have reserved a section of the garden for wedding guests to camp, which has 4 preexisting deluxe tents. With cots and blankets, each deluxe tent can fit at least 6 persons. If your party size is 4-6 or you have other individuals you’d like to stay with, let us know.

Families might be a good fit.
If you have camping gear (tent, pad, quilt / blanket), please bring it. Otherwise, let us know when RSVPing and we’ll place you in one of the deluxe tents. We will also be setting up extra tents from our surplus gear.
For guests that aren’t staying on the premises, we will try to suggest some local hotels, but we will not be heavily involved in this area of the planning.
Camping map and regulations at https://greatriveroutfitters.com/images/files/Camping_Rules_Regulations.pdf

articles.title: FAQ
articles.description: Please send questions to Linh Phan <violinhino@gmail.com> and we'll add them here.
articles.contents:
Contents
Are pets allowed?
Are children allowed?
Where do I shower?

Are pets allowed?
Unfortunately, the venue doesn’t allow pets. We’re sorry but you’ll have to leave your furry friends at home.
Are children allowed?
Yes! Bring your babies and we’ll teach them Ultimate.
Where do I shower?
There is a solar-bag setup for showering. We also recommend bathing in the river. Please note that the facility is minimal in general.

                        RSVP
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Hello and welcome!
            ⅀(x, y) = "$x ♥️ $y"
            We are celebrating our marriage July 23–25, 2021 at an encampment along the Connecticut River in Windsor, Vermont. The venue is the Path of Life Garden, which is a fusion of stunning sculpture arts, event space, river trip outfiters, and campground.
            The ceremony and reception will start at 4 pm on Saturday, July 24. We hope you can join us camping and a whole weekend of fun (see Schedule and Venue).
            
            Huge thanks to our dear friend, Silvia Canelón, for creating this beautiful website.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Trang & Daniel

articles.title: RSVP
articles.contents:
Path of Life Garden, 36 Park Rd, Windsor, VT 05089
Map
We appreciate your early response! Make sure you scroll all the way down and hit Submit when finished. Please send additional comments/questions to our event coordinator Linh Phan violinhino@gmail.com.

articles.title: Schedule
articles.contents:
Add to Calendar
Friday, July 23rd
Kayaking trip

13:00 - 16.00
Explore the Connecticut river on kayak/canoe/paddle board!
Potluck dinner

18:30 - 20.00
Anything made or purchased with love is appreciated!
Socializing

20:30 - 23.00
Beer. Bonfire. Bliss.
Saturday, July 24th
MYOB

08:00 - 11:00
Make your own bagel. And coffee.
Calibration yoga

09:00 - 10:00
An alignment-based practice session that transcends boundaries.
Unstructured joy

11:00 - 15:00
Water activities, yard games, ultimate disc, sculpture garden tour
Unconventional ceremony

16:00 - 17:00
Yup.
Reception

17:30 - 20:00

Bonfire hang

20:00 - 
Dancing with the Driftwood band.
Sunday, July 25th
MYOB

08:00 - 11:00
See Saturday.
Off-the-grid 5K Race

09:00 - 10:00
~5 km double-loop around the garden.Potential uneven footing. Watch your step!
Award ceremony

10:00 - 11:00
Best of each gender group receives special trophy.
Lingering festivities

11:00 - 14:00
Adieu.
